content:
Archineer Associates provides all required for implementation of Communication and information Technology consulting and professional services in Lao PDR. We deeply design and management expertise in IT for businesses, government, and instutitions. Archiineer CIT was established the goal of providing smart It solution include:

  • Mobility
  • Cloud
  • IT outsourcing
  • Communication System Design
  • Computer Network System Design
  • Security and Access Control System Design
  • Data center
  • Digotal Signage System Design
  • Identification System Design
  • IT strategy and Policy Planning
  • Telecommunication Transformation Program
  • Others
